title: Alex Polizzis Italian Islands S01E01 PDTV.x264-TVC.mp4
description:
Alex Polizzi delves further into her heritage, exploring the culture, cuisine and history of some of Italy's most beautiful islands.

This time, Alex will be visiting Sardinia, glamorous Capri, Ischia, and the Aeolian Islands, before exploring Sicily from north to south, experiencing its festivals, learning about its past and listening to the stories of locals.

Throughout her travels, Alex's lifelong love of Italy shines through, providing a personal, unusual and revealing guide to the islands of this beautiful, historic country.




Alex Polizzi's Italian Islands - Series 1, Episode 1


Sardinia

Alex explores Sardinia's rich and diverse culture, and uncovers more of her family roots. She visits caves used by bandits, samples the Cagliari cuisine, and ventures inland to see the rugged beauty of the Supramonte region.


Original Air Date: 26-Nov-2015
